info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 11:52PM CDT until July 05 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN COOK COUNTY... At 1151 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Des Plaines, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Ohare Airport, Wheeling, Park Ridge, Northbrook, Elk Grove Village, Niles, Lake View, Irving Park and West Ridge. This includes... Lincoln Park Zoo, Loyola University, Oakton Community College, Harper College, Northeastern Illinois University, Northwestern University, and Wrigley Field. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 62 and 84. I-94 between mile markers 26 and 47. I-290 between mile markers 1 and 3. I-294 between mile markers 26 and 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
